Articles.Content:
Introducing Snowtiger's first spacecraft posted on the Spacecraft Exchange forum.

The Hydra Supersonic Fighter Jet can reach speeds up to 333m/s while cruising.

It is very easy to control and can do some nice maneuvers like a loop-de-loop and barrel rolls.

It is not an SSTO.

**Features:**

2 Standard Jet Engines

2 Ram Air Intakes

1 Communication Rod on the nose for aesthetic purposes

Donuts in the glove box

2 Blue Headlights

2 Airbrakes
